titles.title: STOP the FEDS Act
To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to permit a State to elect not to establish an American Health Benefit Exchange.
Stop the Federal Exchanges from Destroying States Act
STOP the FEDS Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Stop the Federal Exchanges from Destroying States Act or the STOP the FEDS Act - Amends the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to authorize a state to elect not to establish any required Exchanges for the state (or to cease the operation of all required Exchanges for the state) if the state enacts a law that provides for such election. Authorizes a state to repeal such a law and provide for the establishment of an Exchange for the state.
